asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of Big Al, with a wide, unsettling grin. He is the carnival manager, a huge man with a thick mustache and coal-black eyes. His grin doesn't reach his eyes, making it look predatory. He is wearing a loud, checkered jacket. The scene is illuminated by a single, harsh spotlight, creating a dramatic, intimidating atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes detailed textures and a slightly distorted, wide-angle perspective.
